column4: can anybody help me i have a dell laptop with a dell 1390 WLAN MiniCard and are having problems connecting with my wifi on ubuntu 7.10

can anybody help me i have a dell laptop with a dell 1390 WLAN MiniCard and are having problems connecting with my wifi on ubuntu 7.10
What chipset does it use? Use the command lspci | grep bcm to see.
